title: DUCSS App
desc: A React Native mobile app created for the Dublin University Computer Science Society (DUCSS) featuring user authentication, society information, and social features.

title: roscoargus.dev
desc: My React portfolio website created to provide information about me and highlight some of the work I've done.

title: Taxy: An Interactive Taxonomy Builder
desc: A project done as part of the TCD SwEng Project 2024 in collaboration with Quantexa to dynamically generate and interact with taxonomies, powered by ChatGPT and React.

title: County Hunter
desc: A multiplayer geolocation game created using React, Firebase, and the Google Places API where players compete to discover a number of locations and finish with the highest score.
